name: Yakdonalds
description:
This was made for the Low Effort Game Jam 12 - even this description will be low effort so be warned  :)  Feel free to donate, it will only serve to encourage me to pursue this hobby.

Welcome to Yakdonald's. As a new employee, you will be working the fry station. It is the latest in a robotic line only needing a single employee to operate.  Each customer will delight with your perfectly packaged large container of french fries. Yakdonald's offers the best in competitve minimum wages.

It's a simple clicker, you must press the P button on the french fry maker to drop the batch into the fry container.  Your score and earnings increase as you sell each order, but any food waste comes out of your paycheck. After your first couple of dollars, if your earnings drop to zero the game is over, but you get to review your score and level.  Feel free to post scores here.
